standard_american_english: She knows she wants me as much as I want her. She's playing hard to get, but I like to work for what I want.

aae_from_sae: Ain't no matter who I want my girl to be, I'ma slide in they DMs.
standard_american_english: No matter who I want my girlfriend to be, I'm going to direct message them.

aae_from_sae: You ain't never called me, so you ain't feelin' me like that, so just let it go.
standard_american_english: You never called me, so you don't like me that much, so save that.

standard_american_english: If you stay in that house, you won't have a man, I promise.

standard_american_english: I can't stand to see her talk like that; most girls don't have half of what you have.

standard_american_english: Because I'm human, I have my worries... I get stressed out, I deal with problems! Yes, I do pray, but I still have my tantrums! Lol.

standard_american_english: People say they're moving to Atlanta and are about to come up. Two months go by and the truth becomes reality: the cost of living. #WelcomeToATL

standard_american_english: I hate when people think material things define a person. Just because someone is wealthy in possessions does not mean they have a rich life. Only physical things with souls are us.

aae_from_sae: Lol.. I'ma try. Lol probably ain't gon' happen though. I just wanna do it for two years.
standard_american_english: Lol.. I'm going to try. Lol probably not though. I just want to do it for two years.

aae_from_sae: I done enough to take a break for two years, and dudes still gon' be behind me in body count. I need a break. Lol.
standard_american_english: I've done enough to take a break for two years, and guys would still be behind me in body count. I need a break. Lol.

aae_from_sae: Think 'bout it, y'all women can't marry y'all selves, y'all can't get down on one knee and propose to a dude, that's just whack.
standard_american_english: Think about it, you women can't marry yourselves, you can't get down on one knee and propose to a guy, that's just lame.

aae_from_sae: I had girls jump when I told 'em to jump and roll when I told 'em to roll. But at the end of the day, dudes don't want nobody who a pushover, at least I don't.
standard_american_english: I've had girls jump when I've asked them to jump and roll when I asked them to roll. But ultimately, guys don't want someone who is a pushover, at least I don't.

aae_from_sae: I don't feel like I should have to re-teach my brothers this... I say it again, do not love these women.
standard_american_english: I don't feel like I should have to re-teach brothers this... I repeat, do not love these women.

aae_from_sae: When folks out here shootin' up movies and schools, you a fool if you 21 or older and ain't got no gun.
standard_american_english: When you have people out here shooting up movies and schools, you are foolish if you are 21 or older without a gun.

aae_from_sae: I be lazy sometimes, but at least a woman can't say I'm annoying; I just keep forgettin' to text and call 'em back.
standard_american_english: I tend to be lazy, but at least a woman can't say I'm annoying; I keep forgetting to text and call them back.

aae_from_sae: I ain't tryna confront her; I ain't got no issues with her. It's her greedy best friend that need to go somewhere.
standard_american_english: I refuse to confront her; I have no issues with her. It's her greedy best friend who needs to go away.

aae_from_sae: Good night. I got priorities to handle in the mornin'. I'm 'bout to hit up Chipotle.
standard_american_english: Good night. I have priorities to take care of in the morning. I will be having Chipotle.

aae_from_sae: The judge questioned you, you called your own lyrics nonsense, but you still keep it real, @ChiefKeef?
standard_american_english: The judge questioned you, you called your own lyrics nonsense, but you still keep it real, @ChiefKeef?

aae_from_sae: What Tom Cruise, Mel Gibson, Johnny Depp, and @ChiefKeef all got in common? They all some dope actors.
standard_american_english: What do Tom Cruise, Mel Gibson, Johnny Depp, and @ChiefKeef all have in common? They are all great actors.

aae_from_sae: But marriage the only way I’m havin’ kids. Plus, if I find a good partner, they definitely deserve a ring.
standard_american_english: However, marriage is the only way I will have children. Plus, if I find a good enough partner in life, I think they deserve a ring.

aae_from_sae: Real fans know ain’t no games matter 'til after the All-Star weekend, when most teams start pushin’ for the playoffs.
standard_american_english: Real fans know that no games matter until after the All-Star weekend, when most teams make their playoff pushes.

aae_from_sae: Anyone who like Gunplay over Jay-Z ain’t no 90's baby; you had a rough musical upbringing.
standard_american_english: Anyone who prefers Gunplay over Jay-Z is not a 90's baby; you had a troubled musical upbringing.

aae_from_sae: I can’t. Nah, I refuse to mess with a girl from D.C. But if she in school, that’s different; she ambitious then.
standard_american_english: I can't. No, I refuse to get involved with a girl from D.C. However, if she is in school, that's different; she is ambitious then.

aae_from_sae: I'm glad @UberFacts run by a bro. It make me happy to know that @KrisSanchez educatin' the world one tweet at a time. #Respect
standard_american_english: I'm glad @UberFacts is run by a brother. It makes me happy to know that @KrisSanchez educates the world one tweet at a time. #Respect

aae_from_sae: My bro just let me know he got that OG Kush available at ODU. Hit me up if you need that for your night.
standard_american_english: My brother just let me know he has that OG Kush available at ODU. Let me know if you need that for your night.

aae_from_sae: @Trini_sexiness I'm waitin' on you to change your profile pic so I can tell you how good it look.
standard_american_english: @Trini_sexiness I'm waiting for you to change your profile picture so I can tell you how good it looks. ;)

aae_from_sae: The little boy in my profile pic ain't my son. Lol, he my nephew. I'm on team no kids.
standard_american_english: The little boy in my profile picture isn't my son. Lol, he's my nephew. I'm on team no kids.

aae_from_sae: @SimplyDlightful lol why you so serious? I'm just playin' with you. That dude probably ain't even wash his hands anyway. :)
standard_american_english: @SimplyDlightful lol why so serious? I'm just joking with you. That guy probably didn't even wash his hands anyway. :)

aae_from_sae: When I get my first pair of Louis Vuitton shoes, you know I’m gon’ do the money dance. Until then, I’m just Harlem shakin’.
standard_american_english: When I buy my first pair of Louis Vuitton shoes, I will actually do the money dance. Until then, I'm just Harlem shaking.

aae_from_sae: #Scandal comin’ on tonight, so I get to see my beautiful wife on TV lookin’ like a whole snack.
standard_american_english: #Scandal comes on tonight, so I get to see my beautiful wife on TV looking like a glass of sexy.

aae_from_sae: I always like the wild ones, but dang, 20 voicemails and 50 calls though.
standard_american_english: I always like the crazy ones, but wow, 20 voicemails and 50 calls though.

aae_from_sae: Raven is wild; her right hook be on a thousand. And my ex can’t fight worth nothin’. Shakin’ my head.
standard_american_english: Raven is crazy; her right hook is on a thousand. And my ex already can't fight. Shaking my head.

aae_from_sae: If I could be 17 again, I probably wouldn’t. I really believe everything happens for a reason.
standard_american_english: If I could be 17 all over again, I probably wouldn't. I'm a firm believer that everything happens for a reason.

aae_from_sae: I been celibate since I left Virginia. It gotta be God 'cause the Lord know I love me some intimate moments.
standard_american_english: I have been celibate since I left Virginia. It must be God because the Lord knows I love some intimate moments.

aae_from_sae: I wouldn't even be mad if somebody told me they had a wild night out. That’s just how it go in Norfolk.
standard_american_english: I wouldn't even be upset if someone told me they had a wild night out. That's to be expected in Norfolk.

aae_from_sae: I ain't tryna ruin her day or make her upset; this just hit me this mornin'.
standard_american_english: I'm not trying to ruin her day or make her upset; this just came to me this morning.

aae_from_sae: @Below_Mee I hope you ain't gettin' upset when you can't hang out 'cause you gotta be a father and handle your business.
standard_american_english: @Below_Mee I hope you don't get upset when you can't hang out because you have to be a father and take care of responsibilities.

aae_from_sae: How you gon' shoot an unarmed person? What you scared of?
standard_american_english: How can you shoot an unarmed person? What were you afraid of?

aae_from_sae: Some of 'em lettin' that badge go to they head. How hard would they go if they ain't the feds?
standard_american_english: Some of them are letting the badge go to their head. Because how hard would they go if they weren't the feds?

aae_from_sae: People flex on Twitter, but you know me outside this Twitter stuff. Don’t do it.
standard_american_english: People flex on Twitter, but the whole time you know me outside of this Twitter stuff. Don't do it.

aae_from_sae: It ain't even about what you said; it's the fact you was talkin' to my ex. I don’t mess with your ex or bait. I’d rather not.
standard_american_english: It's not about what you said; it's the fact that you were even talking to my ex. I don't communicate with your ex or bait. I would rather not.

aae_from_sae: A wise man once told me, when you want success as much as you want to breathe, you gon' achieve just that.
standard_american_english: A wise man once told me that when you want success as much as you want to breathe, you'll achieve just that.

aae_from_sae: Ain't no worries when you doin' you, whether folks like you or not.
standard_american_english: No worries when you are doing you, whether someone likes you or not.

aae_from_sae: Now I got one of my girls sayin' she scared (Tajhanae).
standard_american_english: Now I have one of your girls saying that she is scared (Tajhanae).

aae_from_sae: I ain't even gotta wait 'til Monday to regret it; I regret it right now!
standard_american_english: I didn't have to wait until Monday to regret it; I regret it now!

aae_from_sae: I'ma make you feel a way you ain't never felt before.
standard_american_english: I will make you feel a way you've never felt before.

aae_from_sae: I can't even describe what I'm feelin'; I don't know if it's anger, frustration, or sadness.
standard_american_english: I can't describe what I'm feeling; I don't know if it's anger, frustration, or sadness.

aae_from_sae: At the tax shop, I really miss my cousin. I'm holdin' back these tears, maybe 'cause knowin' his birthday comin' up this month is killin' me.
standard_american_english: At the tax shop, I really miss my cousin. I'm holding back these tears, maybe because knowing his birthday is this month is killing me.

aae_from_sae: Get a life, fam. Don’t be frontin’; your girl talkin’ ‘bout me.
standard_american_english: Get a life, boy. Don't put on a show; your girlfriend is talking about me.

aae_from_sae: Man, forget you, lyin’ weak dude. Don’t be lyin’ ‘bout Troya. I ain’t gotta tax you, bruh. You actin’ like you gettin’ it. Can’t wait ‘til tomorrow, fam.
standard_american_english: Fuck you, lying weak person. Don't lie about Troya. I don't have to tax you, boy. You act like you're getting it. I can't wait until tomorrow, boy.

aae_from_sae: I can’t believe you played me. You chillin’ with my brother, my boo. You know I’ll always love you.
standard_american_english: I can't believe you played me. You hung out with my brother, my significant other. You know I'll always love you.

aae_from_sae: I love them hood dudes; that’s my issue, and yeah, I like it. I got a problem.
standard_american_english: I love hood guys; that's my problem, and yes, I like to. I have a problem.

aae_from_sae: I want my man so bad. This pain is too much, and I know he’s the only one who got patience for me.
standard_american_english: I want my boyfriend so badly. This pain is so unbearable, and I know he's the only one who has patience for me.
